. Meanwhile, Lee's colleague, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand Gillbrand made a stop in Rochester Friday afternoon. She did not have much to say on Lee's actions, but rather on the voters in the district. My focus is on the constituents in teh district, and my goal is that they are all well looked after and have access to all the constituent services they need during this time of transition, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ,( D) New York. Kirsten Gillibrand did work closely with Lee to craft legislation for the families of Flight 3407 victims. Bernie Sanders ( I., Vt.), who spoke for eight-and-a-half hours on the Senate floor on Dec. 10 against an extension of the Bush-era tax cuts for upper-income Americans, is publishing the entire oration in a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. Mr. Sen. Bernie Sanders 's original talk, which was an emotional critique of last year's tax-cut deal between the Obama White House and Republican leaders, was not strictly speaking a filibuster, since Mr. Sen. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . The future of this plant is without doubt guaranteed. Windsor Assembly is Chrysler's oldest plant and its only North American assembly plant running on three shifts. Well, it's not a games console at all, according to the Microsoft chief at least." Xbox isn't a gaming console", he said in an interview with USA Today. Xbox is a family entertainment center. It's a place to socialise. It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body . Abu Ghraib en de gevolgen ervan, zoals de beschuldigingen van` marteling' door critici van de oorlog in Irak en de president, werden een schadelijke afleiding , redeneert Donald Rumsfeld ."
